title: Smart Data Models - Curve
description: Adapted from CIM data models. A multi-purpose curve or functional relationship between an independent variable (X-axis) and dependent (Y-axis) variables.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be Curve

CurveDatas.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The curve of  this curve data point. Default: 'list'

curveStyle.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The style or shape of the curve. Default: None

xUnit.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The X-axis units of measure. Default: None

y1Unit.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The Y1-axis units of measure. Default: None

y2Unit.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. The Y2-axis units of measure. Default: None
